## CircuitStorage.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an instance of CircuitStorage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(_dataSource: IDataSource<CircuitData>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_dataSource | [IDataSource](./js-sdk.idatasource.md)&lt;[CircuitData](./js-sdk.circuitdata.md)&gt; | data source to store circuit keys |
